title: Ghost Crab
description: Taking advantage of some time off, Private Investigator Jude Byrne grabs his husband, packs up the car, cranks his favorite tunes, and hits the open road. Destination: Cape Cod. Psychic Copeland Forbes is looking forward to some fun in the sun, but when everything that could go wrong does go wrong in the most hilarious ways possible, he needs to find a way to turn his crabby husbandâ€™s frown upside down. A little sexy time in the shower might be what they need to get this vacation back on track. What could possibly go wrong? Ghost Crab is a 6,200-word SHORT STORY and was a featured submission in the Boys of Summer Story Giveaway.
author: Pandora Pine
